content: direct link to pattern pdf 1 pattern is entirely in japanese but charted calls for japanese size 8/0 5 0 mm hook **yarn ** * color a approx 35g 37 6 meters * color b approx 110g 118 25 meters **note ** the website and pdf include two different patterns this is the entry for the blue and brown bag bag a on the left in the photos on the website the entry for the beige bag bag b is here 2 1 http //www gosyo co jp/img/acrobat/amikomo2008/1 pdf 2 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/amikomo-1-nukunuku-rover-bag-b
